Package database

Class RoomDAO

java.lang.Object
database.RoomDAO
public class RoomDAO extends Object
This class provides data access to the rooms table in the database. It allows to perform CRUD operations on the rooms table, including adding, updating and deleting rooms.

  • Constructor Details

    • RoomDAO

      public RoomDAO()
      Constructor to create a new RoomDAO object. If the connection to the database is null, it tries to connect to the database by calling the connectToDatabase() method of the Connect class.

  • Method Details

    • addRoom

      public static void addRoom(Room room) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new room into the rooms table.
      Parameters:
      room - a Room object containing the room_number, room_price, and description of the new room.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllRooms

      public static List<Room> getAllRooms() throws SQLException
      Returns a list of all rooms in the rooms table.
      Returns:
      a List of Room objects containing all the rooms in the rooms table.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAvailableRooms

      public static List<Room> getAvailableRooms(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws SQLException
      Returns a list of all available rooms for a given date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the date range.
      endDate - the end date of the date range.
      Returns:
      a List of Room objects containing all the available rooms for the given date range.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getRoomByID

      public static Room getRoomByID(int id) throws SQLException
      Returns a Room object with the given room ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the room to be retrieved
      Returns:
      A Room object with the given ID, or null if no room with the given ID exists
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • isRoomRented

      public static boolean isRoomRented(int roomID) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a room has been rented and if the rental is still active.
      Parameters:
      roomID - The ID of the room to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the room has been rented and the rental is still active, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

      Returns:
